page.title: 04FLECKNEY SCHOOL PRESENT
page.content: FLECKNEY PRIMARY SCHOOL PRESENT The extension opened in 1974 is a single storey building of open plan design.Seven classes of children are housed in the building their ages range from 7 to 11.As there are no dividing walls between the classes a number of quiet rooms are provided as well as art areas, television studio, kiln room,hall,medical room,cloakroom and toilets.There is also a kitchen for cooking midday lunches.In some areas moveable screens can be used to give small quiet areas. To cut down on noise carpet and polystyrene ceiling tiles are used. The school has a large playing field civering approximately 2 hectares(5acres) as well as some lawns shrub areas, car park and paved playing areas.
